title: Yuusha Ga Onna Da to Dame Desu Ka? - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Yuri
tags: Female Protagonist   Game Elements   Harem-seeking Protagonist   R-15   Summoned Hero   Transported to Another World
author: Black Dog God   Kuro Inukami   黒犬神
description:
It won’t do because I am a woman? Is that so? Is that so…

If that’s the case then I just have to make a girls party only!!

When she came to, Haruna a high school student was already summoned to a different world.

I will form a girls only party, a harem!!>
